author: Pittsburgh News, Sports, & More
title: Jonah Heim vs. Dodgers Preview, Player Prop Bets - June 13
text:
The Texas Rangers, including Jonah Heim (.158 batting average in his past 10 games), take on starting pitcher Michael Grove and the Los Angeles Dodgers at Dodger Stadium, Thursday at 10:10 PM ET.
In his most recent game he had a hitless performance (0-for-4) against the Dodgers.

Jonah Heim Game Info vs. the Dodgers Game Day: Thursday, June 13, 2024 Game Time: 10:10 PM ET Stadium: Dodger Stadium TV Channel: BSSW Live Stream: Watch this game on Fubo Dodgers Starter: Michael Grove Bet on this or any MLB matchup at BetMGM
Jonah Heim At The Plate Heim is batting .237 with six doubles, six home runs and 12 walks. Heim has recorded a hit in 36 of 60 games this year (60.0%), including 13 multi-hit games (21.7%). In six games this year, he has homered (10.0%, and 2.6% of his trips to the dish). In 31.7% of his games this year, Heim has driven in at least one run. In nine of those games (15.0%) he recorded two or more RBI, while accounting for three or more of his team's runs in two contests. He has scored in 16 games this season (26.7%), including multiple runs in five games. Rep your team with officially licensed MLB gear! Head to Fanatics to find jerseys, shirts, and much more.
Jonah Heim Home/Away Batting Splits Home Away 31 GP 28 .236 AVG .239 .288 OBP .270 .355 SLG .339 7 XBH 5 3 HR 3 13 RBI 18 26/7 K/BB 18/5 0 SB 1 Dodgers Pitching Rankings The pitching staff for the Dodgers has a collective 8.7 K/9, the 10th-best in the league. The Dodgers have a 3.26 team ERA that ranks fourth across all MLB pitching staffs. The Dodgers rank 16th in baseball in home runs surrendered (72 total, one per game). Grove (4-2) makes the start for the Dodgers, his second of the season. In his last appearance -- in relief on Wednesday -- the righty tossed one inning against the Texas Rangers, giving up one earned run while surrendering two hits.
